'''Josephine Gillan''' is an actress based in the UK.

In ''[[Game of Thrones]]'' she is playing the role of [[Marei]], a new prostitute in Lord [[Petyr Baelish]]'s brothel. She joined the cast as a guest star in the [[Season 2|second]] season and has reappeared in the [[Season 3|third]] and [[Season 4|fourth]].

According to her IMDB profile she is 5'1" in height.
